issue.title: [C++] Type casting function kernel suite
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1492](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1492). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Tracking issue to collect related casting issues

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1492?focusedCommentId=16682610) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
We still have more to do, but we don't need an umbrella JIRA to track further casting functions
